title: ML-Ensemble: Scikit-learn style ensemble learning
description: The following notebook introduces ML-Ensemble, a Python library for memory-efficient parallel ensemble learning with a Scikit-learn API. ML-Ensemble also deploys a neural network-like API for building ensembles of several layers, and can accomodate a great variety of ensemble architectures. For more information, see ml-ensemble.com or visit the github repository.
